details.purpose: Ein generischer Container-Archetyp zur Bereitstellung von Informationen, die mit anderen geteilt werden müssen.
details.use:
Als generischer Archetyp zur Bereitstellung von Informationen, die mit anderen geteilt werden müssen, wenn kein spezialisierter Archetyp für einen bestimmten Berichtstyp existiert.
Übliche Anwendungsfälle sind: Dokumentation einer Antwort auf eine Informationsanfrage; Dokumentation des Ergebnisses einer Untersuchung; Dokumentation von Maßnahmen die durchgeführt wurden; oder Dokumentation von eingetretenen Ereignissen.
Der Hauptabschnitt "Content" wurden absichtlich ausgelassen. Dadurch kann dieser Abschnitt mit beliebigen SECTION- oder ENTRY-Archetypen gefüllt werden.

details.purpose: *Generic container archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others.(en)
details.use:
*Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)

details.purpose: En generell behållare för information som behöver delas med andra.
details.use:
Används som en generell arketyp för information som behöver delas med andra när specifik arketyp för ändamålet saknas.
Vanliga användningsområden är att dokumentera ett svar på en förfrågan om information, resultatet av ett test, aktiviteter som har utförts, eller händelser som har inträffat.
De huvudsakliga avsnitts- och innehållskomponenterna har avsiktligt lämnats obegränsade. Det tillåter utvidgning med alla SECTION- eller ENTRY-arketyper som är lämpliga för det kliniska syftet i en mall.

details.purpose: 다른 사람들과 공유될 필요가 있는 정보를 운반하기 위한 일반적인 컨테이너 아키타입
details.use:
*Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)

details.purpose: Arquétipo de conteúdo genérico para carregar informações que precisam ser compartilhadas com outros.
details.use:
*Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)

details.purpose: نموذج جنيس (غير محدود الملكية) يحتوي على معلومات من أجل مشاركتها مع الجميع.
details.use:
*Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)

details.purpose: Generic container archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others.
details.use:
Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template.

details.purpose: Archetipo contenitore generico per veicolare informazioni che devono essere condivise con gli altri.
details.use:
*Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)

details.purpose: 通用的容器类原始型，用于携带需要与他方共享的信息。
details.use:
当不存在适用于具体报表类型的专用原始型时，作为通用的原始型，用于携带需要与他方共享的信息。
常见的用例包括：记录对信息请求的响应、检测（检验/检查）结果、已经执行的活动或者已经发生的事件。
在此故意对其总的章节/内容（Sections/Content）构成要素不加约束。这样，在模板当中，就可以利用任何适合相应临床目的的章节型（SECTION）或条目型（ENTRY）原始型来对其加以填充。

details.purpose: 用作携带共享所需信息的通用容器原型。
details.use: 用作携带共享所需信息的通用原型。 常见用例是：请求信息的响应记录；测试结果；已进行的活动；或已经发生的事件。 主要的Section/Content有意设计为不受约束，从而允许在模板中填充符合临床目的的任何 SECTION 或 ENTRY 原型。

details.purpose: Arquetipo contenedor genérico para la portación de información que necesita ser compartida con otros.
details.use:
*Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)

details.purpose: En generisk container-arketype for å lagre informasjon som skal deles med andre.
details.use:
Brukes som en generisk arketype for å lagre informasjon som skal deles med andre.
Vanlige bruksområder: Dokumentasjon av svar på informasjonsforespørsel, prøveresultat, aktiviteter som er utført, eller hendelser som har skjedd eller hendelser som har skjedd, der det ikke finnes spesialiserte arketyper for de spesifikke rapporttypene. Eksempler på dette kan være laboratoriesvar, logistikkmeldinger, dialogmeldinger, helseopplysningsmeldinger og statusrapporter til fastlege.
Innholdskomponenten er bevisst latt være ubegrenset. Dette tillater bruk av enhver SECTION- og/eller ENTRY-arketype som er nødvendig/hensiktsmessig i templaten brukt i den aktuelle kliniske konteksten.

details.purpose: *Generic container archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others.(en)
details.use:
*Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)

details.purpose: Generiek containerarchetype om informatie over te dragen die met anderen moet worden gedeeld.
details.use:
*Use as a generic archetype to carry information that needs to be shared with others, where no specialised archetype for a specific report type exists.
Common use cases are: documenting a response to a request for information; the outcome of testing; activities that have been performed; or events that have occurred.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)

details.purpose: Arquetip contenidor genèric usat per transmetre informació que s'ha de compartir amb altres.
details.use:
S'utilitza com a arquetip genèric per transmetre informació que s'ha de compartir amb altres quan no existeix un arquetip especialitzat per a un tipus d'informe concret.
Els casos més comuns són: documentar una resposta a una sol·licitud d'informació; el resultat d'una prova; les activitats que s'han dut a terme; o els esdeveniments que han tingut lloc.
El component principal Seccions/Contingut s'ha deixat deliberadament sense restriccions. Això permet emplenar-lo amb qualsevol arquetip de tipus SECTION o ENTRY apropiat per al propòsit clínic dins d'una plantilla.

items.items: وثيقة لتوصيل المعلومات للآخرين, عادة كاستجابة لطلب من طرف آخر.
حالة التقرير بشكل كلي. و لا تمثل هذه الحالة جزءا من التقرير و إنما جميعه ككل.
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
* e.g. Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
*Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.(en)
*The status of the entire report. Note: This is not the status of any of the report components.(en)
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
* e.g. Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.
The status of the entire report. Note: This is not the status of any of the report components.
Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.
Documento para comunicar información a otros, comunmente en respuesta a la solicitud de un tercero.
Información para la identificación del informe.
El estado del informe como un todo. Nota: no se refiere al estado de alguno de los componentes del informe.
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
* e.g. Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
Documento para comunicar informações a outros, comumente em resposta a uma solicitação de terceiros.
Informação de identificação sobre o relatório.
O estado de todo o relatório. Nota: este não é o estado de qualquer dos componentes do relatório.
Informação adicional requerida para capturar o contexto local ou para alinhar a outros modelos de referência/formalismos.
Por exemplo: requisitos de informações locais ou metadados para alinhar com equivalentes do FHIR or CIMI.
Dokument som brukes for å kommunisere informasjon til andre, ofte som svar på en forespørsel.
Status for hele rapporten. Merk: Dette er ikke statusen for noen av enkeltkomponentene i rapporten.
Ytterligere informasjon som trengs for å kunne registrere lokalt definert innhold eller for å tilpasse til andre referansemodeller/formalismer.
For eksempel lokale informasjonsbehov eller ytterligere metadata for å kunne tilpasse til tilsvarende konsepter i FHIR eller CIMI.
Ein Dokument zur Übermittlung von Informationen an andere, meist als Antwort auf eine Anfrage.
Der Status des gesamten Berichts. Hinweis: Dies ist nicht der Status einer Berichtskomponente.
Zusätzliche Informationen zur Erfassung lokaler Inhalte oder Anpassung an andere Referenzmodelle/Formalismen.
Zum Beispiel: lokaler Informationsbedarf oder zusätzliche Metadaten zur Anpassung an FHIR-Ressourcen oder CIMI-Modelle.
일반적으로 다른 상대의 요청에 대한 응답으로, 다른 사람들과 정보를 통신하는 문서.
전체 리포트의 상태. 주의: 이것은 리포트 컴포넌트들 중 어떤 부분의 상태가 아님.
로컬 컨텍스트를 획득하는데 필요하거나 다른 참조 모델/표현과 조정에 필요한 추가 정보
예: 로컬 정보 요구사항 또는 FHIR나 CIMI의 동등한 것들과 조정하는 추가 메타데이터
Asiakirja tiedon välittämiseksi muille, vastauksena yleensä toisen osapuolen pyyntöön.
Koko raportin tila. Huomaa: Tämä ei ole minkään raporttiosien tila.
Tarvitaan lisätietoja paikallisen tilanteen mallintamiseksi tai yhdenmukaistamiseksi muiden vertailumallien / muodollisuuksien kanssa.
Esimerkiksi: paikalliset tietovaatimukset tai ylimääräiset metatiedot FHIR- tai CIMI-vastaavien mukaisiksi.
Documento per comunicare informazioni ad altri, comunemente in risposta ad una richiesta di un altro soggetto.
Lo stato dell'intero rapporto. Nota: Questo non è lo stato di alcuna delle componenti del rapporto.
Informazioni aggiuntive necessarie per catturare il contesto locale o per allinearsi con altri modelli/formalismi di riferimento.
Per esempio: requisiti informativi locali o metadati aggiuntivi per allinearsi con gli equivalenti FHIR o CIMI.
Document om informatie met anderen te communiceren, vaak op verzoek van een andere partij.
De status van de rapportage. Let op, dit is niet de status van een van de onderdelen van de rapportage.
Extra informatie nodig om de context te beschrijven of te voldoen aan andere modellen of formalismen.
Bijvoorbeeld: lokale informatievereisten of aanvullende metadata om overeen te komen met FHIR- of CIMI-equivalenten.
Dokument för att förmedla information till andra, vanligen som svar på en begäran från en annan part.
Status för hela rapporten. Observera att detta inte är status för någon av rapportkomponenterna.
Plats för tilläggsinformation som krävs för lokala anpassningar eller anpassning till andra referensmodeller eller formella krav.
Exempelvis lokala informationskrav eller metadata för anpassning till FHIR- eller CIMI-motsvarigheter.
用于交流信息的文件，通常是为了响应某一方的请求
关于这份报告的标识信息。
整份报告的状态。注意：这不是指报告的任何一个组成部分的状态
用于捕获本地的上下文或与其他参考模型/形式保持一致所需的其他信息。
比如：本地的信息需求或是为了与FHIR或CIMI保持一致的其他元数据。
用于向他人传达信息的文档，通常是为了响应另一方的请求。
整个报告的状态。注意： 这里指的并不是任何报告构成要素的状态。
采集本地上下文背景/语境或者是与其他参考模型/形式化体系保持一致时所需的其他信息。
例如：本地信息要求/需求，或者是与 FHIR 或 CIMI 等效项保持一致时所需的其他元数据。
Document per comunicar informació a altres persones, normalment en resposta a una sol·licitud procedent d'una altra banda.
L´estat de tot l´informe. Nota: No és l'estat de cap dels components de l'informe.
Informació addicional necessària per registrar el context local o alinear-se amb altres models/formalismes de referència.
Per exemple: requisits d'informació local o metadades addicionals per alinear-se amb els equivalents de FHIR o CIMI.
